tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository for TaskHero AI with the necessary configurations.
tasks.details: Create a new Git repository for TaskHero AI. Initialize with a README.md file and set up the main branch. Ensure that the repository is linked to the appropriate remote repository on GitHub or similar platform.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the repository is created successfully and is accessible via the remote URL.

tasks.title: Update Core Application Files
tasks.description: Update all core application files to reflect the new branding of TaskHero AI.
tasks.details: Modify package.json to change the name, description, keywords, and repository URLs. Update README.md and README-task-master.md to replace all instances of TaskMaster with TaskHero. Rename index.js and bin/task-master.js to reflect the new branding.
tasks.testStrategy: Run a search for 'TaskMaster' in the codebase to ensure all instances are replaced. Validate that the application starts without errors after changes.

tasks.title: Update Configuration & Scripts
tasks.description: Revise all configuration files and scripts to incorporate TaskHero branding.
tasks.details: Update all script files in the scripts/ directory to replace TaskMaster references. Modify MCP server configurations in mcp-server/ and update source code comments and string literals in src/.
tasks.testStrategy: Run all scripts to ensure they execute correctly and verify that no TaskMaster references remain.

tasks.title: Update Documentation
tasks.description: Revise all documentation files to reflect the new TaskHero branding.
tasks.details: Update all documentation files in the docs/ directory, including CHANGELOG.md and LICENSE, to replace TaskMaster references. Ensure that all asset files in assets/ are updated with the new branding.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct a thorough review of all documentation to ensure consistency and accuracy in branding.

tasks.title: Update CLI Commands & Help Text
tasks.description: Revise CLI command descriptions and help text to reflect TaskHero branding.
tasks.details: Update all CLI command descriptions, help text, error messages, and user-facing strings to replace TaskMaster with TaskHero. Update banner/logo text in UI modules as necessary.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all CLI commands to ensure they function correctly with the new branding and that help text is accurate.

tasks.title: Update Dependencies & External References
tasks.description: Revise all dependencies and external references to reflect TaskHero branding.
tasks.details: Update npm package name in package.json from 'task-master-ai' to 'task-hero-ai'. Modify any hardcoded URLs or references in the codebase and update MCP configuration examples accordingly.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure that the package can be installed with the new name and that all external references are functional.

tasks.title: Update Testing & Build Files
tasks.description: Revise testing and build files to reflect TaskHero branding.
tasks.details: Update test descriptions and assertions in the tests/ directory. Modify jest.config.js if the project name is referenced. Ensure that any build or deployment scripts are updated accordingly.
tasks.testStrategy: Run all tests to confirm that they pass with the updated branding and that build processes complete successfully.

tasks.title: Conduct Functional Testing
tasks.description: Perform functional testing to ensure all CLI commands work with the new branding.
tasks.details: Verify that all CLI commands function correctly with the new names and that there are no errors in execution.
tasks.testStrategy: Execute each CLI command and confirm that the expected output is produced without errors.

tasks.title: Conduct Integration Testing
tasks.description: Perform integration testing to ensure MCP server works with the new branding.
tasks.details: Test the integration of the MCP server with the updated configurations to ensure it operates correctly with the new branding.
tasks.testStrategy: Run integration tests and monitor the MCP server for any issues or errors during operation.

tasks.title: Finalize Documentation Review
tasks.description: Conduct a final review of all documentation to ensure consistency and accuracy post-rebranding.
tasks.details: Review all documentation files for consistency in branding and ensure that no references to TaskMaster remain. Update any migration guides if necessary.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform a final check of all documentation and confirm that it is ready for publication.
